content:
Verse 1:
D A
Money can't buy me love
G D
I don't need diamonds or pearls
Bm G
I'm happy with my simple life
D A
I don't do anything to get rich

Chorus:
G D
My heart is full of joy
Bm A
I don't need anything more
G D
I have everything I need
Bm A
And that's all that really counts

Verse 2:
D A
I don't chase after fame
G D
I don't need to be in the spotlight
Bm G
I'm content with who I am
D A
I don't do anything to get rich

Chorus:
G D
My heart is full of joy
Bm A
I don't need anything more
G D
I have everything I need
Bm A
And that's all that really counts

Bridge:
G D
Money can't buy happiness
Bm A
It's the simple things in life that matter most
G D
I'm grateful for what I have
Bm A
And that's all that really counts

Chorus:
G D
My heart is full of joy
Bm A
I don't need anything more
G D
I have everything I need
Bm A
And that's all that really counts.
